bill.title: Medical marijuana; authorize Alcorn State University to enter memoranda of understanding for local farmers to grow for out-of-state vendors.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize Alcorn State University To Establish A Program Of Cooperative Farming For The Cultivation Of Marijuana For Distribution To Out-of-state Vendors Legally Authorized To Dispense Marijuana For Medical Purposes; To Define Certain Terms; To Prescribe Certain Provisions Regarding The Cultivation Of Marijuana For Medical Purposes Which Must Be Included In A Memorandum Of Understanding Between A Local Farmer And Alcorn State University; To Create The Medical Marijuana Local Farmers Special Fund In The State Treasury For The Deposit Of Certain Moneys Collected In Connection With The Cultivation Of Marijuana; To Authorize Local Jurisdictions To Enact Ordinances Restricting Farms For The Cultivation Of Marijuana For Medical Purposes Under This Act; To Amend Sections 41-29-125, 41-29-127, 41-29-136, 41-29-137, 41-29-139, 41-29-141 And 41-29-143, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity To The Provisions Of This Act; And For Related Purposes.
